text: John George Martinkovic (February 4, 1927 â€“ February 8, 2018) was an American football. He was born in Hamilton, Ohio. Martinkovic was a defensive lineman in the National Football League for the Green Bay Packers and the New York Giants. He played college football and basketball at Xavier University and was drafted in the sixth round of the 1951 Draft by the Washington Redskins.John Martinkovic's profile at Oldest Living Pro Football Players Martinkovic died on February 8, 2018 in Allouez, Wisconsin of complications from dementia at the age of 91.Former Packers DE John Martinkovic passes away ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:New York Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: John Martinkovic
